name: TechFesta
tagline: Turning dreams into reality through technology
description:
TechFesta is a service of AG Enterprises, LLC. It inspires entrepreneurs, small and mid-size businesses, who believe in challenging the status quo, to achieve greater heights and pursue their dreams. Our services include mobile apps, website development, graphic design and technical consultancy.
We value and are driven by "festa" - flexibility, fun, excellence, speed, trust, accessibility and affordability.
Our mission is to turn dreams into reality by making a positive impact in the world through technology.
